items.description: Buttermilk Fried Chicken, Maple Bacon Doughnuts, Maple Syrup

items.description: Egg choice: Eggs any style, Egg Whites, or Vegan ‘Cheesy Cauliflower Eggs’. Protein choice: Sausage, Bacon, Fresh Fruit. Served with Vegan Smashed Avocado Toast, Maldon Sea Salt, Chives

items.description: Black Forest Ham, Poached Eggs, and Classic Hollandaise on a house-made White Cheddar Biscuit with Sour Cream & Onion Scalloped Potatoes

items.description: Sliced Ribeye, Peri Peri Seasoning, Roasted Potatoes, Onion, Bell Peppers, Kale, Portabello Mushrooms, two Poached Eggs, Cajun Hollandaise, Buttermilk battered crispy Onions

items.description: Salmon with Maple Pecan Panko Crust, Pearled Cauliflower, seasonal Vegetables, Charred Lemon

items.title: Steak & Eggs
items.description: Chimichurri-marinated 8 oz. Flat Iron Steak, two Eggs any style, Sour Cream & Onion Scalloped Potatoes, White Cheddar Biscuit, Red Wine Maple Gravy

items.title: Great Maple BLT
items.description: piled high Thick Cut Smoked Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, Aïoli on Toasted Levain. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Vegan Patty Melt
items.description: a Vegan twist on an American classic! Impossible & Roasted Beet Patty, Vegan Cheddar, Caramelized Onions, Pickles, special sauce on Toasted Levain. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Falafel Wrap
items.description: Chickpea Falafel, Arugula, Toy Box Tomatoes, Kalamata Olives, Pickled Onions, Tzatziki, Cauliflower Hummus on Warm Flatbread. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Fried Fish Sandwich
items.description: Cornmeal crusted Catfish, Jalapeño Aïoli, sliced Jalapeño, Pickled Onions, Cilantro Lime Slaw on a Brioche Bun. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Hot Honey Fried Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Buttermilk Fried Chicken, Cabbage Slaw, Hot Honey Aïoli, Melted White American Cheese. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Steakhouse Burger
items.description: Aged White Cheddar, Arugula, Tomato, Pickled Red Onions, Aïoli on a Brioche Bun. Add Avocado, Bacon, Eggs any style at an additional charge. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute for Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.

items.title: Rib Eye Melt
items.description: Prime Rib, Pesto Aïoli, Aged White Cheddar, Red Onions, Arugula, Tomato. Includes choice of Fries or Field Greens. Substitute: Parmesan Truffle Fries or mini Caesar at an additional cost.
